title: VR-Based Science Curriculum Design Using Systematic Instructional Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A practical science education program for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design educational scenarios by applying the ADDIE model components (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation) to VR simulations.
Learners can systematically implement interactions in VR-based science experiment modules using a systematic design approach.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of VR educational content and propose improvements according to summative evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
